example_sentence_italian: Conosco un marciapiede vicino a casa.
example_sentence_english: I know a sidewalk near home.

example_sentence_italian: La larghezza del marciapiede è standard.
example_sentence_english: The width of the sidewalk is standard.
We work on the downtown sidewalks.
I step down from the sidewalk.
They come from the nearby sidewalks.
There is a crack in the sidewalk.
There are roots in the sidewalks.

example_sentence_italian: Non parcheggiare la bici sul marciapiede.
example_sentence_english: Do not park the bike on the sidewalk.
The kids play on the sidewalks.
I was walking with the sidewalk wet.
We work with the damaged sidewalks.
